alert.note: Alert for Elmore; Macon; Tallapoosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 02 at 4:30AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Elmore, north central Macon and southeastern Tallapoosa Counties through 500 AM CST... At 430 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Dexter, or near Wetumpka, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wetumpka, Tallassee, Notasulga, Eclectic, Martin Dam, Santuck, Liberty City, Ten Cedar Estates, Dexter, Southern Lake Martin, Tallapoosa City, Jordan Lake, Claud, Yates Dam, Central, Jordan Dam, Wallsboro, Reeltown and Yates Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
